i5.las2peer.services.gamificationPointService

Class GamificationPointService

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.api.Configurable
      • i5.las2peer.api.Service
        • i5.las2peer.services.gamificationPointService.GamificationPointService

  • public class GamificationPointService
extends i5.las2peer.api.Service
    Gamification Point Service This is Gamification Point service to manage point element in Gamification Framework It uses the LAS2peer Web-Connector for RESTful access to it. Note: If you plan on using Swagger you should adapt the information below in the ApiInfo annotation to suit your project. If you do not intend to provide a Swagger documentation of your service API, the entire ApiInfo annotation should be removed.

      • debugMapping

        public boolean debugMapping()
        Method for debugging purposes. Here the concept of restMapping validation is shown. It is important to check, if all annotations are correct and consistent. Otherwise the service will not be accessible by the WebConnector. Best to do it in the unit tests. To avoid being overlooked/ignored the method is implemented here and not in the test section.
        Returns:
        true, if mapping correct

      • getRESTMapping

        public java.lang.String getRESTMapping()
        This method is needed for every RESTful application in LAS2peer. There is no need to change!
        Returns:
        the mapping
